featured.text: After the 1960s, and especially since the 1980s, the high school prom in many areas has become a serious exercise in excessive consumption, with boys renting expensive tuxedos and girls wearing designer gowns.

definition.zh_def: 一種正式的男士服裝，通常由黑色或深色的外套和白色襯衫組成，常在正式場合穿著。
definition.en_def: A formal suit for men, typically consisting of a black or dark jacket and a white shirt, often worn at formal occasions.
definition.example: He wore a tuxedo to the wedding, looking very dapper.
